_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Five qualities of a carer who is not com: Don't know what is suitable and unsuitable
Care for the sick for the sake of material benefits, not out of love
Disgusted to remove feces, urine, vomit, or spit
Unable to educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire the patient with a Dhamma talk from time to time
Five qualities of a carer who is compete: Know what is suitable and unsuitable
Care for the sick out of love, not for the sake of material benefits
Not disgusted to remove feces, urine, vomit, or spit
Able to educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire the patient with a Dhamma talk from time to time
